definition: Spring Festival couplet (the first line of which is pasted on the right side of a doorway at New Year, and the second on the left side)
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: People put New Year scrolls on the wall for good fortune.
sentences.chinese: 人們把春聯貼到牆上，以求好運。

sentences.english: This year is no exception, early to put Spring Festival couplets sent to my house.
sentences.chinese: 今年，亦不例外，早早地就把春聯送到了我的家裏。

sentences.english: The Chinese people love to stick couplets on the Spring Festival, which are also written on red paper.
sentences.chinese: 春節時，中國人喜好貼春聯，春聯也是用紅紙寫的。

sentences.english: The Chinese people love to stick couplets on the Spring Festival, which are also written on red paper.
sentences.chinese: 春節時，中國人喜好貼春聯，春聯也是用紅紙寫的。

sentences.english: The original Spring Festival couplets inscribed in peach wood board, then rewrite on paper.
sentences.chinese: 原來春聯題寫在桃木板上，後來改寫在紙上。

sentences.english: The Ming dynasty, the Spring Festival couplets real popularization began with zhu yuanzhang's advocate relevant.
sentences.chinese: 春聯真正普及始於明代，與朱元璋的提倡有關。

sentences.english: Pasting couplets is a great custom during Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 貼春聯是春節的一大習俗。

sentences.english: Because in the US during the Spring Festival couplets.
sentences.chinese: 因爲在春節期間我們貼春聯。

sentences.english: New year messages are pasted at the doorways and neighbours gather to chat.
sentences.chinese: 過年的時候門口貼着春聯，鄰居們則聚集在一起聊天。

sentences.english: The Chinese paste spring couplets on the gateposts when celebrating Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 中國人在慶祝春節的時候會在門柱上貼春聯。

sentences.english: The famous calligrapher gave away some of the spring couplets he wrote.
sentences.chinese: 這位知名書法家將他寫的一些春聯送給別人。

sentences.english: People put New Year scrolls on the wall for good fortune .
sentences.chinese: 人們把春聯貼在牆上好運氣。

sentences.english: By the end of year, spring festival couplets of every family will stick out particularly.
sentences.chinese: 時至年中，家家戶戶門上的春聯，還格外顯眼。

sentences.english: He thinks my couplets will bring best wishes for the whole family in the coming year.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲我寫的春聯能爲全家人在明年帶來最好的祝福。

sentences.english: People are still on the wall couplets.

sentences.chinese: 春聯的一個源頭是桃符。

definition: rhyming couplet/pair of lines of verse written vertically down the sides of a doorway/CL:副[fu4],幅[fu2]
to write or draw with a brush/to put pen to paper/to write
colored lantern (used at Lantern Festival 元宵節|元宵节)
merchandise sold for Chinese New Year
money wrapped in red as a gift/bonus payment/kickback/bribe
